name: Chaos Dwells
description:
-GAME DESCRIPTION-

Walk into the blue portal to advance to the next floor. Demo ends after 4th floor boss.

WASD to move

Mouse and primary click to cast spell. Clicking when mana is out will stun the mana regen.

Hit 'R' to change your spell, the unstable magic source affects your ability to choose a specific spell.

alt-f4 to quit haha

You heal when you level up.

some spells aren't effective at level 1, try using them later when you have more mana.

This demo has 7 basic starter spells and 3 enemies with simple AI. Beat the boss on floor 4 to win the demo!

Please Vote and leave feedback!

-STORY-

You, an apprentice wizard, arrive at the subterranean city's broken down gates. Once a Dwarven metropolis of industry, it now lays in ruin.
A strange, strong magic leaks from the ground and calls to you from deep below

-Info-

Made for the Roguelike Game Jam in March 2022.

In a playable but unrefined state, doesn't have audio and still has placeholder graphics
